messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Margaritas???
messages.msgSnippet: Oh, BTW, if you make that cheesecake, you make it late in the evening...tell the kids it won t be ready until tomorrow....and then eat it all!!!  Then the next
messages.messageBody:
Oh, BTW, if you make that cheesecake, you make it late in the evening...tell the
kids it won't be ready until tomorrow....and then eat it all!!! Then the next day
you tell them that it didn't work!
Ann....who is (really) not that devious. Ha!

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Margaritas???
messages.msgSnippet: Ann:  thanks, that was delicious!   (Did you see the recipe for Margarita Cheesecake?  OHHHHHHHH,,,, how do I keep the kiddies away from that one if I make it?
messages.messageBody:
Ann: thanks, that was delicious! (Did you see the recipe for Margarita
Cheesecake? OHHHHHHHH,,,, how do I keep the kiddies away from that one if I
make it? I'll have to hide in the closet......Yummmmmmy) LOL (ps is Tommy
Turner related to you? I saw the name on another post regarding the virus and
became confused at who I was talking to.)

Tammy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Margaritas???
messages.msgSnippet: Hee...  Hee....  Thanks Tammy!  I knew one of the smart unschoolers on here would have some ideas! Ann----------  who passes Tammy a nice chilled margarita on
messages.messageBody:
Hee... Hee.... Thanks Tammy! I knew one of the smart unschoolers on here would
have some ideas!
Ann----------> who passes Tammy a nice chilled margarita on the rocks!

messages.subject: Margaritas???
messages.msgSnippet: Hmmm, thought maybe that would get some attetion..(the subject) Does anyone have a recipe for a margarita mixer???  I seem to be constantly running out
messages.messageBody:
Hmmm, thought maybe that would get some attetion..(the subject)
Does anyone have a recipe for a margarita mixer??? I seem to be
constantly running out <Bg> I'm sure I should be able to mix some of my
own....
Any ideas?
Ann
